# iOS User Experience Options When Jailbreak Detected

Last updated January 11, 2024 by Appdome

Learn how to notify iOS users when Jailbreak is detected.  You can customize the Jailbreak Enforcement Notification that will display to a mobile user if Appdome detects a Jailbreak event.

## App Compromise Notifications

When Appdome’s technology detects that a mobile app may be running on a Jailbroken device, the default behavior is to **exit** the app and display an [App Compromise Notification](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/notify-android-ios-users-when-threat-detected/) to the mobile user.

This Knowledge Base article provides instructions on how to customize the Jailbreak Enforcement Notification when Jailbreak is detected.

We hope you find it useful and enjoy using Appdome!

## Security Features on Appdome

Appdome is a no-code mobile security and development platform supporting a wide variety of implementations for Android and iOS apps. Using a simple ‘click to add’ user interface, Appdome allows anyone to add mobile app security to any iOS or Android app in seconds, no code or coding required.

Using Appdome, there are no development or coding prerequisites. For example, there are no Appdome SDKs, libraries, plug-ins, software or hardware to implement. Likewise, there are no required infrastructure changes.  Users simply upload an Android or iOS app, select their choice of features from Appdome’s Security category, and click “Build My App”. The Appdome technology adds the chosen mobile security features to the app (plus any required standards or framework extensions) automatically, with no manual development work at all.

### How to Customize the Jailbreak Enforcement Notification for Users

Follow these step-by-step instructions to customize App Compromise Notification for Jailbreak Detection. To learn about all the different App Compromise Notifications available on Appdome, please visit this [KB article](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/notify-android-ios-users-when-threat-detected/).

![Jailbreak Detection Toggle](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Jailbreak-Detection-toggle.png)

1. Customize the text in the **App Compromise Notification** free-form text box.
2. Click **Build My App**

**Congratulations!** You now have a mobile app fully integrated with security.

![Success Msg](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Success_MSG-650x362.png)
